availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ann Eliza (Viley) Johnson (Wife of George Washington Johnson)

body.p: Born in Kentucky, daughter of Willa Viley and Lydia Smith Viley. Married George Washington Johnson. Mother of Eliza Woolfolk (Johnson) Johnston, Madison Conyers Johnson, Martha Lydia (Johnson) Payne, and Junius Ward Johnson.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for Ann Eliza (Viley) Johnson (1815-1875), Find A Grave Memorial # 98984670, Georgetown Cemetery, Georgetown, Scott County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=98984670 (accessed 8 Aug 2017).
